bug.author: thkukuk
bug.description: The dldt/get-started-linux.md documented references <DLDT_DIR>/inference-engine/samples/sample_data in several places, but I'm not able to find that directory or any references to it except in the documentation.

comments.comment: The documentation issue with get-started-linux.md has been addressed by this PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/pull/750>#750</denchmark-link> . Find updated guide here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/releases/2020/4/get-started-linux.md>https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino/blob/releases/2020/4/get-started-linux.md</denchmark-link> .
